trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Fountain
There were 2 other sightings in Fountain on or around April 20th 2012
Summary: DIM WHITE LIGHT, FLASHED BRIGHT, TURNED AND DISAPPEARED
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is my second signting the same evening. It was about 8:35 at night and I was sitting in my hot tub facing east. I had my head laid back looking straight up. I saw a dim light at high altitude going fairly slow heading south east. I watched it for about 20-25 seconds. Object did sharp turn which appeared to be to the south west. The object went behind a thin, whispy cloud. A bright light flashed then went dim and went faster then first saw then just disappeared. This was a very eventful night. This was the 2nd of 3 sightings I had that night. As stated in my previous report, I am a retired Master Sergeant of the Air Force of 22 years of service. I have seen several known aircraft and have never seen anything move like this. I will be filing my 3rd report after this is completed.
